All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Accelerator
model of accelerator power up
Avatar
 
BaseGroup
view base group to which all visible nodes are added
BaseScene
view of the base scene to which the base group is added
Bomb
model of bomb item
Bomb
view of bomb item
BomberMan
model of the bomberman character
BomberMan
view of the bomberman character
Bug
model of the bug enemy
Bug
view of the bug enemy
ChangeType
types of changes used by OO pattern
Character
model of character class
Character
view of a character
Characters
manage all characters
Continue
view of continue board
Defeat
view of defeat board
Direction
 
Element
model of a generic element of the game (e.g. characters, items etc)
Element
view of an element. all elements are image views.
EmptyTile
model of an empty tile of the board
End
handles the end of a game
End
view of a final board (e.g. continue, defeat, victory)
EndOptions
 
Enemy
model of an enemy character
ExistingProfile
manage an existing profile
ExistingProfile
a profile board for an existing player profile
Exit
model class for exit
ExplosionExpander
model of explosion expander power up
ExtraBomb
model of extra bomb powerup
Game
new game controller class to load and manage a game
GameBoard
to load the game board with its cells and configuration
GameBoard
the board the game is played on
GameBoard
the view for the board of the game. observes the relevant model class
GameHeader
view of the game header, with lives, timer, points etc.
GameScreen
view of the entire game screen. includes game header and game board
HardWall
model of a wall tile
Helix
model of the helix enemy
Helix
view of the helix enemy
Hidable
this interface has the sole purpose of marking objects as Hidable (e.g. power ups and the exit).
Hidable
the view of hidable objects (e.g. power ups and exit)
Hiding
 
Item
class used to group and separate items (e.g. power ups, exit) from other types of elements
Item
view of a generic item (e.g. bombs and hidables)
JBomberMan
 
KeyListeners
key listeners to handle commands during the game
Level
instantiates a level with characters, board, timer, keyListeners etc.
LoadProperties
utility class to load properties from file
NewProfile
manage a new profile
NewProfile
a profile board with all stats at 0, no nickname and default avatar
Player
model of Player
PowerUp
model of power up. implements hidable as power ups can be hidden behind enemies and soft walls
Profile
profile board. contains nickname textfield, stats, and avatar selection buttons
ProfileLookUp
to load the profile lookup screen
ProfileLookUp
screen for existing profile lookup
SoftWall
model of a soft wall (wall that can be destroyed by a bomb) implements Hiding as soft walls can hide power ups and exit
SoftWall
view of a softwall tile
Tile
model of Tile element
Tile
view of a tile. each tile has a description to handle different shadows from other tiles/items
Timer
 
Timer
model of timer
Timer
view of the timer
Victory
view of victory board
Wall
 
Welcome
welcome board to select existing or new player
